hero.title: A group of professionals who illuminate the future of the region and technology
hero.description:
From office, factory, and facility electrical work to security and communication infrastructure.
We provide safe and reliable construction services in the Kanto area.

electrical.title: General electrical work
electrical.description: Support for basic facilities such as distribution boards, lighting, and outlets in buildings

security.title: Security equipment construction
security.description: Support for strengthening security and monitoring systems such as ITV cameras and access control systems

network.title: LAN・Network construction
network.description: Support for comfortable communication environments in offices and facilities. Also supports wireless LAN and telephone wiring

fiber.title: Fiber optic cable splicing and measurement work
fiber.description: Fiber optic cable construction that connects the foundation of high-speed communication, from splicing to measurement

works.title: Construction history
works.description: Factory, office, store, etc. Experience and trust accumulated in a wide range of sites. Please also take a look at the before and after of the construction.

recruit.title: We are recruiting people who can grow together from inexperienced people!
recruit.description: We offer support for obtaining qualifications and training. If you want to get a job in your hand, please let's talk once.

news.title: Latest news and information
news.description: We are reporting company activities, construction reports, and latest information on recruitment.

strengths.title: Why Willnet is chosen
strengths.description: Many qualified people・Established for many years・Flexible one-stop support. We have technology and experience that can respond to the diverse sites in the Kanto area.

flexibility.title: Flexible response
flexibility.description: Propose the best solution for any site, whether corporate or individual

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: For inquiries about construction, estimates, and recruitment, please use the form below or call us.

hero.title: Willnet Services
hero.description: Delivering reliable technology and speed across electrical, communications, and security fields.

electrical.title: General Electrical Work
electrical.description: From distribution boards, lighting, and outlets to emergency power systems, we support electrical work for homes, offices, and factories with reliable technology.

security.title: Security Systems & CCTV Installation
security.catch: Protecting with technology, ensuring peace of mind.
security.description: We propose and install security equipment including CCTV cameras, access control systems (IC cards, biometric authentication), security sensors, and alarm systems to protect your facility.

network.title: LAN & Network Installation
network.description: We support office IT infrastructure with LAN wiring (wired and wireless), Wi-Fi access point installation, router and HUB configuration, and network equipment implementation.

fiber.title: Fiber Optic Installation & Fusion Splicing
fiber.description: We provide high-precision services including fiber optic installation, fusion splicing, OTDR measurement, and network construction for telecommunications companies and businesses.

strengths.title: Willnet's Strengths
strengths.description: Key strengths common to all our services.

qualification.title: Many Qualified Personnel
qualification.description: Work performed by nationally certified professionals.

onestop.title: One-Stop Service
onestop.description: Comprehensive support from design to construction and maintenance.

local.title: Local Focus
local.description: Rich experience in Chiba and the Kanto area.

area.title: Service Area
area.description: We serve the entire Kanto area, with a focus on Chiba Prefecture.

WorksPage.title: Construction Projects
WorksPage.catch: Supporting your projects with reliable technology and trust.

ContactCTA.title: Feel Free to Contact Us
ContactCTA.description: For inquiries about construction, estimates, and recruitment, please use the form below or call us.
